Reference Text: <S sid="31" ssid="3">The perceptron has been used in many NLP tasks, such as POS tagging (Collins, 2002), Chinese word segmentation (Ng and Low, 2004; Zhang and Clark, 2007) and so on.</S><S sid="0">A Cascaded Linear Model for Joint Chinese Word Segmentation and Part-of-Speech Tagging</S><S sid="1" ssid="1">We propose a cascaded linear model for joint Chinese word segmentation and partof-speech tagging.</S><S sid="58" ssid="9">Instead of incorporating all features into the perceptron directly, we first trained the perceptron using character-based features, and several other sub-models using additional ones such as word or POS n-grams, then trained the outside-layer linear model using the outputs of these sub-models, including the perceptron.</S>
